item.content:encoded:
Anticipation for a North Carolina sports betting launch is underway. Although sports betting has been legal in North Carolina since March 2021 it is currently restricted to retail sportsbooks.

First Bet Offer get up to $1,500 paid back in Bonus Bets if you don’t win

Claim Offer

The North Carolina State Lottery Commission has until June 2024 to launch online sports betting, but many sports bettors are optimistic that January 2024 is a more realistic timeline.

The following are the major sportsbooks that are expected to be available in the market once the North Carolina sports betting launch becomes official.

 

BetMGM Bonus Code: First Bet Offer get up to $1,500 paid back in Bonus Bets HERE

  • BetMGM’s interface is amongst my favorite and makes it easy to place bets and find what you are looking for
  • BetMGM also offers a reliable customer service phone line, whereas most other sportsbooks try to push customers away from calling.
  • The BetMGM rewards program and wide network of available states also makes BetMGM and great option


Caesars Sportsbook Promo Code: WAWMETAGET : Bet $50 and Get $250 in Bonus Bets HERE

  • The profits boosts that Caesars Sportsbook come up with are a stand out feature. It is not uncommon to see 30-35 different customized bets from the book each day, and they have the odds promoted and easy to find.
  • The Parlay options are also very special in this book and so is the functionality. You can seamlessly move throughout the app and combine most bets.

Bet $50 and Get $250 in Bonus Bets

Claim Offer

Legalized sports betting in North Carolina could have a significant impact on the state, generating new revenue for the state budget, creating jobs, and boosting economic activity.

The North Carolina State Lottery Commission estimates that the state could generate up to $100 million in tax revenue from sports betting each year. This money could be used to fund important state programs, such as education and infrastructure.

DraftKings Bet $5+ and get $200 in Bonus Bets Instantly HERE

  • The welcome bonus is one of the best in the industry, with a low risk and high reward
  • Odds are generally competitive and come out earlier than other sportsbooks.
  • DraftKings offers early cash out on most bets, which allows you to take a profit or cut your losses before a game is over.
  • DraftKings offers incentives for power players, such as reduced juice for high-volume bettors.

Bet $5+ and get $200 in Bonus Bets Instantly

Top games in North Carolina this weekend:

  • College Football: Minnesota vs North Carolina
  • Date: Saturday, Sept. 16, 2023
  • Time: 3:30 PM EST
  • Odds: North Carolina -7.5 O/U 51

 

  • NFL: New Orleans Saints vs Carolina Panthers
  • Date: Monday, Sept. 18, 2023
  • Time: 7:15 PM EST
  • Odds: New Orleans -3 O/U 39.5

 

FanDuel Bet $5 Get $200 + $100 off NFL Sunday Ticket HERE

  • FanDuel has a lot of boost, same game parlay, and recommended parlay options for those new to sports betting
  • You get the first time welcome bonus regardless of if your first bet wins or losses, which is a huge plus
  • Has a place for both high and low volume and high and low dollar players
  • They release odds early, and often have lines that other books may not have
